p: At Mobiles World, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy contains types of information that are collected and recorded by Mobiles World and how we use it.

This Privacy Policy applies to all services provided by the Mobiles World. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at support@mobilesworld.pk
By using our services, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

The personal information that the user asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be clear at the point we ask users to provide their personal information. Users can refuse to provide such personal information except when they want to use such a feature that requires this information.

The information contains your name, gender, email address, phone number, the contents of the comment you have posted, or messages and attachments you may send to us when you contact us regarding your issues.
However, you can also use our services anonymously without providing any personal information.

Mobiles World's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt out of certain options.
